alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 21 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible as a result of increased moisture from Hurricane Hilary. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following areas, Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Outdoor recreation will be very dangerous this weekend and is strongly ill-advised, particularly in the southwestern Great Basin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
